#
# Source files: DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE: edit CMakeListsLocal.txt instead.
#
#

SET (LOCAL_LIBRARY_BASENAME vtkCISGFile)

INCLUDE (${VTKCISGFILE_SOURCE_DIR}/cxx/CMakeListsLocal.txt)

# --------------------------------------------------------------------------
# You probably do not need to modify anything below this line

#
# Create the vtkCISGFile C++ library
#
# (Doesn't work here because of a CMake bug)
# ADD_LIBRARY (vtkCISGFile LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS)

#
# Create the vtkCISGFile Tcl library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKCISGFILE_WRAP_TCL)

  VTK_WRAP_TCL (vtkCISGFileTCL CISGFileTCL_SRCS LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS)
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkCISGFileTCL CISGFileTCL_SRCS)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFileTCL 
                         vtkIOTCL 
                         vtkGraphicsTCL 
                         vtkImagingTCL 
                         vtkFilteringTCL 
                         vtkCommonTCL
                         ${TCL_LIBRARY})
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFileTCL vtkHybridTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFileTCL vtkParallelTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFileTCL vtkPatentedTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFileTCL vtkRenderingTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKCISGFILE_WRAP_TCL)

#
# Create the vtkCISGFile Python library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKCISGFILE_WRAP_PYTHON)

  VTK_WRAP_PYTHON (vtkCISGFilePython CISGFilePython_SRCS LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS)

  IF (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkCISGFilePython MODULE CISGFilePython_SRCS)
  ELSE (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkCISGFilePython SHARED CISGFilePython_SRCS)
  ENDIF (APPLE)

  IF (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFilePython 
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           debug ${PYTHON_DEBUG_LIBRARY} 
                           optimized ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ELSE (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFilePython 
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ENDIF (WIN32)

  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFilePython vtkHybridPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFilePython vtkParallelPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFilePython vtkPatentedPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFilePython vtkRenderingPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKCISGFILE_WRAP_PYTHON)

#
# Create the vtkCISGFile Java library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKCISGFILE_WRAP_JAVA)

  VTK_WRAP_JAVA (vtkCISGFileJava CISGFileJava_SRCS LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS)
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkCISGFileJava SHARED CISGFileJava_SRCS)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFileJava 
                         vtkIOJava
                         vtkGraphicsJava
                         vtkImagingJava 
                         vtkFilteringJava
                         vtkCommonJava)
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFileJava vtkHybridJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFileJava vtkParallelJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFileJava vtkPatentedJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkCISGFileJava vtkRenderingJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKCISGFILE_WRAP_JAVA)

#
# Link to VTK and local
#

LINK_LIBRARIES (
  vtkCISGFile
  vtkIO
  vtkGraphics
  vtkImaging 
  vtkFiltering
  vtkCommon
)

IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
  LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkHybrid)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
  LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkParallel)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
  LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkPatented)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
  LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRendering)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
